name: Recycled Leather NATO Watch Strap - Chocolate Brown 20mm
description:
My watch-collecting boyfriend taught me everything I know about watch straps and what styles are popular, hence this classic military NATO style strap that looks great with a variety of watch styles.

It's a 20mm brown leather handmade watch strap with nickel hardware. Natural wax linen thread stitching with brown edges. Can be made to other size, let me know which size you need. Watch not included!

name: Recycled Leather Bracelet - Chocolate Brown/Tan
description:
Handmade 20mm wide two color bracelet made from two different leather coats. Small curve design, two thin straps. Nickel rivet enclosure, so bracelet slides over your hand and does not snap.

Each bracelet is unique, and may have small blemishes or discoloration from the old leather, which adds to the beauty and character.

name: Recycled Leather Bracelet - Chocolate Brown/Black
description:
Handmade 20mm wide two color bracelet made from two different leather coats. Small curve design, two thin straps. Nickel rivet enclosure, so bracelet slides over your hand and does not snap.

Each bracelet is unique, and may have small blemishes or discoloration from the old leather, which adds to the beauty and character.

name: Recycled Leather Bund Style Watch Strap - Chocolate Brown 20mm
description:
My watch-collecting boyfriend taught me everything I know about watch straps and what styles are popular, hence this classic military bund style strap that looks great with a variety of watch styles.

It's a 20mm brown leather handmade watch strap with a polished nickel buckle. Natural wax linen thread stitching with brown edges.  Strap is 80mm/130mm and the pad is 50mm wide x 85mm long. Can be made to other size, let me know which size you need. Watch not included!

name: Recycled Leather Bund Style Watch Strap - Tan 20mm
description:
My watch-collecting boyfriend taught me everything I know about watch straps and what styles are popular, hence this classic military bund style strap that looks great with a variety of watch styles.

It's a 20mm tan leather handmade watch strap with a brushed nickel buckle. Natural wax linen thread stitching with brown edges. Strap is 80mm/130mm and the pad is 50mm wide x 85mm long. Can be made to other size, let me know which size you need. Watch not included!
